thread.title: Chidambaram welcomes RBI rate cut of 0.5%
thread.title_full: Chidambaram welcomes RBI rate cut of 0.5% | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Chidambaram welcomes RBI rate cut of 0.5%
text:
Other Articles RBI rate cut to drive growth, banks must follow suit: India Inc SBI slashes lending rate by 0.4% after RBI rate cut, loans become cheaper Reserve Bank of India Increases Foreign Portfolio Investment Limit In Government-securities Former Finance Minister P Chidambaram today welcomed the 0.50 per cent cut in interest rate announced by the Reserve Bank of India ( RBI ) saying it was overdue.
“I welcome the decision of RBI to reduce the repo rate by 50 basis points. This was perhaps overdue.
“Nevertheless, it signals a movement towards a lower interest rate regime and it is therefore welcome,” he said.
He said more policy steps by RBI were possible if the government stayed firmly on path of fiscal consolidation.
“If government stays firmly on the path of fiscal consolidation and fiscal prudence, we can look forward to more policy steps by the RBI,” he said.
Here is Sunil Jain, Managing Editor of The Financial Express’ take on RBI rate cut:
 29, 2015 12:11 pm
